description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Walnut & Stilton Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Walnut & Stilton Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 slice garlic & olive oil sourdough, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chicken, discarding skin and bones. Slice meat.

Preheat grill on high. Place toasted bread on a baking tray. Top with chicken, walnuts and cheese. Place tray under grill and cook for 8 minutes or until cheese is melted. Garnish with parsley leaves and serve.
